|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC;Quantenna Communications, QT3840BC, AA02D2E1, A04538, 1618; |rad2chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''EN :''' Orange Livebox is an ADSL wireless router available to customers of Orange's Broadband services in the United Kingdom, Kenya, Guinea, France, Tunisia, Spain, Jordan, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Poland, Belgium, Orange's Mauritian partner MyT, Lightspeed Communications in Bahrain and Orange Botswana. Depending on the model, it is manufactured by Inventel, Sagem or ZTE. The Livebox is also known as FunBox in some countries like Poland, Ivory Coast and Senegal.
'''FR :''' La Livebox est un appareil électronique fourni par le fournisseur d'accès à Internet Orange (anciennement Wanadoo) à ses abonnés ADSL et FTTH en France, au Royaume-Uni, en Belgique, en Pologne, aux Pays-Bas, en Suisse, en Espagne, en Côte d'Ivoire, au Sénégal, en Tunisie et à ses abonnés WiMAX au Cameroun. La Livebox est commercialisée sous le nom de FunBox dans certains pays comme la Pologne, la Côte d'Ivoire et le Sénégal1. Elle permet de bénéficier du triple play. ==Links of Interest== *[https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Livebox#Livebox_4 ''Livebox 4'' on '''fr.wikipedia.org'''] *[https://www.orange.com/index.php/en/Press-Room/press-releases/press-releases-2016/Orange-s-New-Livebox-revolutionizes-the-connected-world-of-French-households-starting-May-19th Press release] *Orange - Telecom France ([[Sagemcom]]) • [https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Livebox Livebox] :OUI: B0:98:2B (Sagemcom Broadband SAS) *[https://www.redeszone.net/orange/ ''Orange Livebox'' on '''RedesZone'''] *[https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm63138 BCM63138 CPU info] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}} ==See also== *[[Orange Livebox 1.1]] *[[Orange Livebox 2]] :*[[Orange Livebox 2]] :*[[Orange Livebox 2.1]] :*[[Orange Livebox pro 2]] *[[Orange Livebox 3]] :*Orange Livebox 3 Play :*[[Orange Livebox Pro 3]] *[[Orange Livebox 4]] :*[[Orange Livebox 4]] :*[[Orange Livebox Pro 4]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
